Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for analytics, reporting, and visualization needs. Identify the data sources and user groups that will interact with Power BI Embedded.
Design the architecture for embedding Power BI reports, including integration points, data flow, and security measures.
Set up Power BI Embedded capacity in Azure. Choose the appropriate SKU based on performance and scalability requirements.
Set up authentication mechanisms using Azure Active Directory (AAD). Configure role-based access control (RBAC) for secure access to Power BI resources.
Develop the application that will embed Power BI reports. Use Power BI REST APIs and SDKs to integrate analytics into the application.
Apply security best practices, such as data encryption, secure API calls, and token expiration policies to protect embedded analytics.
Perform thorough testing of embedded reports, including functionality, performance, and security validation.
Analyze and optimize the performance of embedded reports by tuning data models, queries, and capacity settings.
Set up monitoring and alerting for Power BI Embedded capacity usage, report performance, and API calls using Azure Monitor.
Create detailed documentation for the embedded analytics architecture, configurations, and operational procedures.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting Power BI Embedded analytics.
Verify that the setup meets regulatory compliance requirements. Implement regular auditing procedures to ensure data security and privacy.
